thread.title_full: MOD publishes equipment plan update and welcomes independent report (MoD - UK Ministry of Defence) ... - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: MOD publishes equipment plan update and welcomes independent report (MoD - UK Ministry of Defence) ...
text: ( Source : MoD - UK Ministry of Defence ) The Ministry of Defence has published its third annual update on its Defence Equipment Plan after an independent audit found the cost of the department’s 13 biggest equipment programmes fell by £247m
